title: Rashami Desai’s boyfriend Arhaan Khan:Rashami Desai’s Alleged Boyfriend Arhaan Khan Says She’ll Never Play Dirty Politics In Bigg Boss 13
text:
Ever since Bigg Boss 13 has begun, Rashami Desai has been making headlines for her alleged affair with Siddharth Shukla. The two contestants who keeps fighting on the show and don’t see eye to eye to each other were reportedly dating at one point in time. Their relationship ended on a sour note, and that can be quite evidently seen on the show.

Facebook

Before she made it to the show, Rashami Desai was in the news for her relationship with Badho Bahu actor Arhaan Khan. It was being said that they were planning to tie the knot inside the house. Rashami Desai, however, had rubbished such reports before entering in the house.

Twitter

Now, Arhaan Khan, her alleged boyfriend has also opened up on such reports. He says they are not planning to get married. Forget marriage, Arhaan says they are not even dating.

“I haven't got any offer from Bigg Boss 13 as of now… We are not getting married. We are not even dating so the news of our marriage is rubbish,” he was quoted as saying by Pinkvilla.

Twitter

Furthermore, he said that he was proud of Rashami Desai. He says she is playing the game with a lot of dignity and grace and that people will not get to see any dirty politics from her side.
